Text.Page:
Your presence is requested at the Legion of Arms hall in Velika.

Please report to Hamile at your earliest convenience."I'm on my way."

Thank you for responding to my request, .

I hope you've been doing well. "Well enough. Why did you summon me?"

I've heard good things about you...that you are learning your archery skills quite quickly.

So I thought it might interest you to know that I have developed a new archery technique."A new technique?"

It will be a new skill for you to learn.

It's something I've been working on for quite a while, actually. I thought that, as such an eager archer, you would want to learn it as soon as possible."Okay, I'm definitely interested."

It will take some effort. I need to be clear about that.

Six steps in total, but the rewards are well worth.

Still want to try?"Yes. Count me in."

The first two steps are fairly simple.

Just clear two dungeons suitable for your level. You can also just clear the same dungeon twice."Okay, that's easy enough."
It might sound easy, but don't let your confidence get the better of you. Dungeons are dangerous...particularly if you go alone.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I understand. I'll be back soon."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Well done, . You still have a long way to go, though.

It will take you some time, but when you're ready for the next step in your training, I'll fill you in on the details, and the rewards.

Take some time to decide if you're truly ready."Okay. Thank you."
